data.title: 15 military discounts on running shoes you'll wish you knew about sooner
data.meta_description: Is the motivation to crush your New Year’s resolutions dwindling? These discounts on new running shoes might be the extra incentive you need.
data.text:
Is the motivation to keep crushing your New Year’s resolutions slowly dwindling? A new pair of running shoes might be the extra incentive you need to get back on the track, trail or treadmill.

For the military community, grabbing a quality pair of running shoes doesn’t have to break the bank. You might be surprised to find that several top brands offer an exclusive discount to military families, veterans, and reservists as a way of saying, “thank you for your service”. You can find a discounted pair for every member of the family: the marathoner, the fashionista, the track star–even the little one who is just beginning to take their first steps. Even better, these deals are available every day of the year (not just Veterans Day!) so make sure to save this article for back-to-school shopping, birthday gifting, and the holiday season.

This list is just the tip of the iceberg as far as military deals go. You, like most military families and veterans, are probably overpaying for everyday purchases, not realizing that hundreds of your favorite brands offer a military discount. From hotels to jewelry stores to theme parks to clothes to baby gear and more, find all of the best military deals on Semper Save.

ASICS

40% discount

ASICS’s founding philosophy, “A Sound Mind, in A Sound Body,” inspires the company’s development of some of the highest quality running shoes on the market.

ASICS offers a 40% military discount to active duty service members (including spouses and dependents), reservists, retirees, and veterans. To get 40% off at ASICS click here and follow instructions to verify your identity through SheerID.

Nike

10% discount

Nike is a brand runners have relied on for decades, and for good reason. They make some of the most versatile shoes on the market. Whether you’re looking for speed or consistent everyday training shoes, Nike has you covered.

Nike offers a 10% military discount to active duty service members (including spouses and dependents), reservists, retirees, and veterans. To get 10% off at Nike, click here and follow instructions to verify your identity through SheerID. This discount is also available at Nike stores when you present a valid military ID at checkout.

New Balance

25% discount

For more than a century, New Balance has been creating some of the best running shoes to help professional athletes and casual joggers alike tackle their goals with confidence.

New Balance offers a 25% military discount to military members. To get 25% off at New Balance, click here and follow instructions to verify your identity through ID.me.

Adidas

30% discount

Adidas’s mission is bold, but simple: to be the best sports brand in the world. Following the example of elite athletes, Adidas never settles for average. Every shoe they design and create is part of their effort to expand the limits of human possibilities and to include and unite people in sport.

Adidas offers a 30% military discount to active duty service members, veterans, retirees, spouses, and dependents. To get 30% off at Adidas, click here and follow instructions to verify your identity through ID.me. This discount is also available at Adidas stores when you present a valid military ID at checkout.

Saucony

20% discount

Since the company’s inception in 1898, Saucony has rightfully taken its place as one of the world’s leading running companies. Whether you’re looking for just the right amount of cushion or for powerful spikes, every runner can find their match with Saucony running shoes.

Saucony offers a 20% military discount to military members. To get 20% off at Saucony, simply shop on the Saucony website and, at checkout, click “Add ID.me discount”. Follow instructions to verify your identity through ID.me.

Under Armour

20% discount

Founded as a sportswear company, Under Armour didn’t actually make its move into running shoes until relatively recently (2009). Over the past decade, Under Armour has gained traction with runners in a real way and has proven that they can compete with their century-old running shoe rivals.

Under Armour offers a 20% military discount to active duty service members, retirees, veterans, military spouses, and military family members. To get 20% off at Under Armour, simply shop on the Under Armour website and at checkout, choose “Military and First Responder Discount”. Follow instructions to verify your identity through ID.me. If you have any questions or issues, click here.

PUMA

10% discount

Hit the road, trail, or anything in between in PUMA’s high performance running shoe collection.

PUMA offers a 10% military discount to active duty service members and veterans. To get 10% off at PUMA, click here and follow instructions to verify your identity through ID.me.

Newton Running

Special Pricing

Newton’s technology is what sets them apart from the competition. Their shoes’ cushioning and responsiveness makes every stride better.

Newton offers special pricing to military members. To get special pricing at Newton, click here and follow instructions on the page to provide proof of eligibility.

Reebok

50% discount

If you’re passionate about running, weightlifting, cross training or studio workouts, Reebok has a range of athletic shoes designed to support you with technology and comfort.

Reebok offers a 50% military discount to military members. To get 50% off at Reebok, click here and follow instructions to verify your identity through ID.me.

Athletic Propulsion Lab

15% discount

Since its founding in 2009, APL has become a world leader in men’s and women’s athletic footwear and apparel. APL’s shoes symbolize the intersection of luxury and performance, providing optimum comfort for all aspects of your lifestyle.

APL offers a 15% military discount to active duty service members (including spouses and dependents), retirees, veterans, and reservists. To get 15% off at APL, click here and follow instructions to verify your identity through SheerID.

Finish Line

20% discount

Finish Line is a popular destination for all kinds of athletic shoes. Finish Line carries popular running shoe brands such as Nike, Adidas, Under Armour, Puma, New Balance, On, ASICS, Brooks, and more.

Finish Line offers a 20% military discount to active duty service members, reservists, retirees, veterans, spouses, and dependents. To get 20% off at Finish Line, shop in-person at a Finish Line store and present valid military ID at checkout.

Foot Locker

10% discount

Foot Locker carries top running shoe brands such as Nike, Adidas, HOKA, Saucony, On, Brooks, ASICS, and more.

Foot Locker offers a 10% military discount to active duty service members (including spouses and dependents), reservists, retirees (including spouses and dependents), and veterans. To get 10% off at Foot Locker, click here and follow instructions to verify your identity through SheerID. This discount is also available at Foot Locker stores when you present a valid military ID at checkout.

JD Sports

20% discount

JD Sports has must-have sneakers, sportswear and accessories including running shoes from top brands such as Nike, Adidas, Under Armour, Puma, New Balance, On, ASICS, Brooks, and more.

JD Sports offers a 20% military discount to active duty service members, reservists, retirees, veterans, spouses, and dependents. To get 20% off at JD Sports, shop in-person at a JD Sports store and present valid military ID at checkout.

Holabird Sports

10% discount

Holabird has more of what moves you including running shoes from top brands such as Saucony, Hoka, On, Nike, New Balance, Adidas, ASICS, Nike, and more.

Holabird Sports offers a 10% military discount to active duty service members, retirees, veterans, spouses, and dependents. To get 10% off at Holabird Sports, click here and follow instructions to verify your identity through VerifyPass.

Shoe Carnival

10% discount

At Shoe Carnival, you can find amazing deals on brand-name shoes, boots, sandals, and sneakers for the whole family. They carry popular running shoe brands such as Brooks, ASICS, Adidas, Nike, Saucony, Puma, and more.

Shoe Carnival offers a 10% military discount to military members. To get 10% off at Shoe Carnival, simply shop on the Shoe Carnival website and, at checkout, click “Verify with ID.me”. Follow instructions to verify your identity through ID.me.

You can find these deals (and hundreds more from your favorite brands) at www.sempersave.com. If you are an active duty service member, military spouse, retiree, veteran, or reservist, you are likely missing out on many military discounts, leaving hundreds of dollars on the table! Check out Semper Save today and start saving.

Semper Save helps military families and veterans save when shopping online. It is the ultimate destination for military and veteran discounts, with thousands of deals that are available online, every day of the year.
